title: NewAir AWR-520SB  52 Bottle Wine Cooler
description:
Key Features
-5 slide-out wood shelves to hold your wine
-Energy-efficient compressor cooling system
-Freestanding or built-in installation options
-Frost-free interior - no defrosting required
-Our largest capacity cooler - holds up to 52 bottles
-Receive in-home warranty repairs for added convenience
-Single zone cooling range of 40-65°F

NewAir AWR-520SB 52 Bottle Wine Cooler
The AWR-520SB wine cooler is our largest capacity wine cooler, designed to protect and preserve your wine collection in ideal conditions. The stylish exterior is matched only by the superior performance of its compressor-based cooling system, which reaches temperatures as low as 40°F. Plus, it includes a in-home warranty repair service that allows you to receive repairs in the comfort of your living space! 

Built-In or Freestanding - You Decide
Thanks to a front veting grille, the NewAir AWR-520SB allows for freestanding placement or its buil-in option under the counter design. Install into your cabinetry for a sophisticated built-in finish, or use it as a freestanding unit. The door is also reversible, giving you complete control of where your wine cooler goes.   

Superior Compressor Cooling
With a temperature range of 40°F to 65°F, the AWR-520SB provides the exact level of cooling you need for your wine, whether it's for long-term storage or if you want it ready to serve. The compressor cooler ensures an even temperature throughout, quiet and virtually vibration free operation. Plus, the compressor has a 10 year life expectancy.

Precision Digital Control
The electronic thermostat and digital control panel gives you precise control over the interior temperature, and lets you easily monitor conditions to make sure your wine is stored properly. There's a security lock to ensure safe storage and an ETL certification safe use. A bulit in internal carbon filter helps keep the interior smelling good and free of  pesky odors.

52 Bottle Storage
Keep up to 52 bottles of wine in this spacious cooler, which features 5 slide-out shelves crafted from finished hardwood, guaranteed to store your growing wine collection. This cooler also includes dual pane protective glass door and triple layer insulation to ensure proper chilling and perfect results every time you open a bottle.

Classic Appearance
The NewAir AWR-520SB features a beautiful, sleek black cabinet and elegant stainless steel trim that combined makes this wine cooler a favorite design feature in your home. The blue LED light illuminates the interior and highlights your collection beautifully, and the adjustable wooden shelves not only make wine selection easy but also allows you to customize the interior.

transcripts: Collectors know that great wine is as much an art form as it is good craftsmanship but in order for wine too mature to its fullest perfection it needs the right conditions. How can we keep it that way? Where is their name we can trust? Introducing the AWR 520SB deluxe wine cooler and innovative environment control system with the touch of elegance. It's one of the best reviewed and most trusted systems on the market a wine needs the right temperature to mature properly. If it's two warm it ages prematurely losing his flavor,  if it's too cold the court contracts letting in oxygen and ruining the wine. The AWR 520SB has a special energy efficient compressor that cools your wine evenly, its triple-a insulation and your pain protective gloves keep the temperature perfect. Its internal carbon filter keeps the air pure was circulating inside. It has a 10-year life expectancy and its front bending compressor is super quiet. There's also a safety lock to keep your wine away from any unwanted customers and it uses no harsh chemicals, its environment friendly. The digital display and easy push-button controls let you keep the temperature exactly how you wanted. The AWR 520SB is one of the best reviewed wine coolers online people like that it's adjustable natural wood shelf can fit up to 52 bottles and that the LED light adds a touch of elegance. It can be freestanding or built-in under the counter, before you install it please refer to the measurements on your screen whether for your living area, kitchen, bar, or impressing at a party. The AWR 520SB is one of the most proven and trusted wine temperature control systems on the market. Don't let the element stop you from crafting your wine to perfection for dependability and innovation you can count on NewAir. [Music] NewAir  a name you can trust. [Music]
